label: 岩倉具視
本: The Meiji Restoration . Stanford University Press . 1972
説明文: (1825-83). Also: Tomoyoshi. Court noble of middle rank; minor Court posts before 1868. Supporter of kobu-gattai party. Later closely linked with Satsuma, especially Okubo Toshimichi. After Restoration, key member of Meiji government; councillor (Gijo); senior minister. Led mission to America and Europe, 1871-73.
